name: DoomSpace
description:
VR support changed to Cardboard technology
Doom Space is a shooter designed for the Cardboard and other Augmented Virtual Reality viewers for iOS devices.

Doom Space is a survival game to enjoy with Smart Phone.
Let's play the survival game on the iPhone and iPad device just like Web
As you may guess from the title, this game is the superexpress survival game to be associate with the hell battle. You can enjoy splendid sounds and realistic 3D graphics with the FPS style.
You can choose a level among five difficulties. Let's sweep hell enemies sticking out of somewhere and clear the mission.
We invite you to 3D graphic world with controls of gravity sensors on the smartphone.
